section.title: publisher number for notated music
section.p: MARC recommendations from the MLA Encoding Standards Subcommittee's MARC Cataloging Inefficiency Task Group:

ul.li: Generally use 028 $q for publication number clarification instead of field 500. If clarification out of the scope of 028 $q is needed, use field 500.

section.p: This recommendation is reflected in the MLA Best Practices in the RDA Toolkit.
